Sangameshwar Road railway station is a station on Konkan Railway. It is at a distance of  down from origin. The preceding station on the line is Aravali railway station and the next station is Ukshi railway station. 6 regular trains stop at Sangameshwar Road Railway Station. Sangameshwarvasiy have demanded stops of 8 more regular trains and 1 special train.
